title: As a user I want to be able to view a player's Contracts and Investigation History tab on the player profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Contracts Tab" on player profile has been updated to indicate the presence of the Investigation History
AND a user is logged in as club or boc
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates player profile contracts tab
custom_expected:
THEN if the player has an Investigation History to display, then the user should see the tab as "Contracts & Inv"
AND if user is a BOC user and the player has at least one investigation request or investigation on file, then they should have an Investigation History displayed
AND if user is a club user and the player has at least one investigation on file OR a request from this Club, then they should have an Investigation History displayed
AND title attribute on the tab should be set to title="Contracts & Investigations" so hovering over the tab displays a browser tooltip

title: As a user I want to be able to view a player's Investigation History
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Player's profile
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Contracts" tab of a player profile
custom_expected: THEN Investigation History widget will appear beneath the Contract History, and follows the provided wireframe and data discovery.

title: As a Club user I want to create a new Investigation Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user wants to create a new investigation request for International Amateur players or Professional players
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Investigation Request" option in the Create New top-level menu for Club users on International Amateur players or Professional players
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch a new Investigation Request for the player. 
AND the form will follow the wireframe and data discovery.
AND Investigation Type is defaulted based on whether or not the Club submitting the request has a submitted contract for the player. If there is a Terms Submitted or higher contract for the player from the submitting Club, then the default is "Contract". Otherwise it is "Pre-Contract".

title: As a user I want to see which files are required within the label dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user opens an investigation request form
And uploaded a file(s)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the label
custom_expected: THEN a red "*" will appear after the required document labels within the label dropdown.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to save an Investigation Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user logs into the system
custom_steps: WHEN Club creates or opens an Investigation Request form in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN

SAVE
* A Save button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode. 
* Clicking Save will save the form and its current values and reload the form in view mode. 
* The request's status will be set to "Preliminary" if this is the first time the request is being saved. Otherwise the status will not change.  
* After a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification. 

CANCEL
* Whenever the form is in edit mode, the user will see a "Cancel" button on the form in grey. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made. 
* If they confirm the cancellation and the form has not yet been saved in the system, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point of the transaction. 
* If they confirm the cancellation and the form has been previously saved in the system, then the form should be reloaded in the default mode (view/edit) for the current state, with none of the edits that were made since the last save and up to the cancellation point reflected.
* If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a user I want to be able to delete an Investigation Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has edit permissions for the form in Preliminary states
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'Delete' button(Grey) on the Investigation Request form in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN system will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form from the system.
**Title:** Warning
**Body:** Are you sure you want to delete this [form]? 
**Hint:** This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.
**Buttons:** Yes, No
AND If they confirm the deletion, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point of the transaction and a blue notification should be thrown confirming the deletion.
Or If they do not confirm the deletion, then they should be returned to the form and no action should be taken. 
AND Deleted requests should not appear on the front end or be searchable.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to submit an Investigation Request to the BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens a preliminary Investigation form in edit or view mode
custom_expected:
THEN 'Submit to BOC' button will available. The button will be blue. 
AND Submit button is available for BOC users when the preliminary form is in edit mode or view mode. The button is grey.
AND Clicking Submit will run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message. 
AND Clicking Submit will run the On Submit rules check (each covered in other stories - this story assumes they all pass).
AND After the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the request to "Submitted"  
AND System reloads the request in view mode, and displays a successful submit blue notification. 
AND Once the request has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in green font in Player's Investigation History.

title: As a BOC user I want to receive an approvals item for a submitted Investigation Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Investigation Request has been Submitted by Club
custom_steps: WHEN BOC checks the BOC - Investigations - Admin's Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN an approval item will be generated and displayed in the widget
AND The files attached are displayed and available for download from the Attachments column of the Approvals widget. 
AND If Comments are populated, they display in the Comments column of the Approvals widget.
AND Player name is a hyperlink in the Approvals widget.
AND Clicking on the player name will open the Player Profile (defaults to Player History tab) in the same window/tab. 
AND "Type" will be a hyperlink.
AND Clicking on the type hyperlink will open the submitted request in view mode in the same window/tab. 
AND This Approvals item should display under the "Micellaneous" filter in the approvals widget.

title: As a Club user I want to see Investigation Requests in my Pending Approvals widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user submitted waiver request
AND has investigation editors role
custom_steps: WHEN user is on Pending Approvals Widget
custom_expected:
THEN Club users should see the submitted waiver request in their Pending Approvals widget.
AND it should match the BOC version of the Approvals item, including rolling off when the request is approved, rejected or sent for update.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to send an Investigation Request back to the Club for updates
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Investigation Request is in Submitted States
custom_steps: WHEN BOC opens the Investigation Request in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Approver should see an "Update Needed" button in grey.
AND clicking "Update Needed" will not run any rule checks. 
AND any changes to the form are saved, and the request's status is updated to "Update Needed"
AND If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode. 
AND A successful blue notification is displayed that states the request was saved.
AND If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
AND Update Player's Investigation History entry to reflect the new status, but it should remain green. 
AND An Action Item should be generated for the submitting Club's Investigations Admin. (#4)

title: As a user I want to see Investigation Waiver Requests differently than Investigation Requests
custom_preconds: GIVEN user logs into the system
custom_steps: WHEN a Club submits an investigation waiver
custom_expected:
THEN the blue successful submit notification should indicate that an Investigation Waiver Request was submitted - not just an investigation request. 
AND the Approvals item, and corresponding Pending Approvals item, should say "Investigation Waiver Request" as the Type instead of Investigation Request. 
AND When a BOC user opens a submitted investigation waiver request, it should match the wireframe, instead of looking the same as a submitted waiver request. 
AND The Investigation Waiver Request should appear in the player's investigation history as an Investigation Waiver Request.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to approve or reject an Investigation Waiver Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user submitted an Investigation Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN BOC opens the Investigation Waiver Request in View or Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN
APPROVE:
* BOC Approvers see an "Approve" button in blue when they are viewing a request (in view or edit mode) in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Update Needed states. 
* Clicking "Approve" will run all required field, formatting, On Submit and On Approve rules checks and display any relevant error or warning messages. 
* Once all rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
* If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode. 
* A successful blue notification is displayed that states the request was approved.
* If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
* Update Player's Investigation History entry for this request to be in black font. 

REJECT:
* BOC Approvers see a "Reject" button in grey when they are viewing a transaction (in view or edit mode) in the Submitted state. 
* Clicking "Reject" will run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages (all covered in previous stories). 
* Once all On Save rules have passed or been overridden, the status is updated to "Rejected"
* Successful reject notification is displayed. 
* If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
* Remove pending investigation history entry.

title: As a Club user I want to be prevented from creating a request for a player I do not have permission to request an inviestigation for
custom_preconds: GIVEN A club user is viewing different org's player profile
custom_steps: WHEN Club Selects "Investigation Request" for that player
custom_expected:
THEN system will know player is currently under contract with a different Org, then an error will display. 
**Error Message:**
This player is currently under contract with another Organization. You may not request an investigation for this player. Please contact the BOC for more information.
AND The only available button should be "Back". Clicking this will return the user to the point of entry.

title: As a BOC user I want approving an investigation request to automatically create a new, preliminary Investigation for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN an investigation request has been submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve" on the Investigation Request
custom_expected:
THEN the system should save any changes made to the request
AND system should mark the request as approved and display a successful approval notification
 AND system should close the request and open an Investigation Form for the player with the Final results for Age and ID set to Pending
 AND investigation Type and Org should be populated from the Request
 AND oif the Investigation Type = Contract then the Investigation Visibility should default to All Orgs
 BIUT if the Investigation Type = Pre-Contract, then the Investigation Visibility should default to Requesting Org(s)
 AND the Investigation Form should automatically be saved as preliminary
AND any Attached Files should be carried from the Request to the Form 
AND the player's Investigation History should be updated 
AND club should be notified of the approval
AND notification should state "Investigation Request Approved"

title: As a BOC user I want approving an investigation waiver request to automatically create a new, preliminary waived Investigation for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN an investigation waiver request has been submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve" from the  Investigation Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN the system should save any changes made to the request
AND system should mark the waiver request as approved and display a successful approval notification
 AND system should remove the Approvals item for the BOC user
 AND system should close the waiver request and open an Investigation Form for the player for which the waiver was requested with the Final results for Age and ID set to Waived
 AND investigation Type and Org should be populated from the Request
 AND if the Investigation Type = Contract then the Investigation Visibility should default to All Orgs
 AND the Investigation Form should automatically be saved as preliminary
AND any Attached Files should be carried from the Request to the Form
 AND the player's Investigation History should be updated
 AND club should be notified of the approval
AND notification should state "Investigation Waiver Request Approved"

title: As a BOC user I want an Investigation to automatically be linked to an existing Minor Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN an Investigation is first created by the user
custom_expected:
THEN the system should locate any contracts in the system for the player with a status of "Terms Submitted" or "Terms Accepted". If one exists, then this contract should be pre-populated in the Contract ID field of the Investigation Form.
Or If no "Terms Submitted" or "Terms Accepted" contracts exist for the player then the system should check for any Approved contracts - if one exists then the contract with the latest Approval stamp should be pre-populated in the Contract ID field of the Investigation Form. 
AND The "Signing Bonus" field should be prepopulated with the signing bonus from the linked contract if no value has been entered. 
AND The "Org" field on the Investigation should be prepopulated with the Signing Org from the contract. If a different Org has already been selected, this Org should be added.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to link an Investigation to a Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an investigation form in edit more
custom_expected:
THEN users should see a "Select" button associated with the Contract ID field (see wire). 
OR If no contract exists for this player, the button should not display.
AND Clicking this button will launch a pop-up for the user to select the associated contract to link to this investigation (see 2nd wire). 
AND The popup will contain a complete list of the Major and Minor League Contracts that exist for this player. 
AND The Status of the Contract, Signing Org, Type and the Date Created will display. 
AND The Status will be a hyperlink to navigate the user to the contract. 
AND The user will only be able to select one contract to link. 
AND The button "Select" should be disabled until 1 contract is selected
AND Clicking "Select" will populate the Contract ID field with the ID of the selected contract. 
AND If a contract ID already existed in this field, it is overwritten. 
AND The "Signing Bonus" field should be prepopulated with the signing bonus from the linked contract if no value has been entered. 
AND The "Org" field on the Investigation should be prepopulated with the Signing Org from the contract. If a different Org has already been selected, this Org should be added.

title: As a user I want to only see Investigations that I have permission to see within the player's Investigation History (updated for ebis2 investigations)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to view a player's Investigation History
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Investigation History Table on Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN Investigation requests should only be visible to the submitting Org, and BOC Investigations
AND Investigation visibility should be controlled by BOC Investigations users on the Investigation form itself
AND if Requesting Org is checked then any Org that has an approved investigation request for the selected investigation should be able to see the Investigation on the player's History
AND if Signing Org is checked, then the Org that the player is currently under contract with should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if All Orgs is checked, then all Orgs should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if BOC Only is checked, then only the BOC should be able to see the investigation on the player's History.

title: As a user I only want to see Investigations in Search that I have permission to see (Created in EBIS2)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to Adv Search for an Investigation created in ebis2
custom_steps: WHEN user performs Adv Search
custom_expected:
THEN Investigation visibility should be controlled by BOC Investigations users on the Investigation form itself
AND if Requesting Org is checked then any Org that has an approved investigation request for the selected investigation should be able to see the Investigation on the player's History
AND if Signing Org is checked, then the Org that the player is currently under contract with should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if All Orgs is checked, then all Orgs should be able to see the investigation on the player's History
AND if BOC Only is checked, then only the BOC should be able to see the investigation on the player's History

title: Investigation History - Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a CLUB or a BOC user has limited Investigation Permission
(test_boc_approver@mlb.com, test_boc_viewer@mlb.com, test_boc_admin@mlb.com, Test-NYY-admin@mlb.com, Test-NYY-viewer@mlb.com, and test-basic-stl@mlb.com)
custom_steps: WHEN the user is in a players profile under 'Contracts' tab
custom_expected: THEN user should only be able to view what they have permission to.

title: Investigations Search - Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a CLUB or BOC user with/without Investigation permission logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user is in advance search
custom_expected: THEN only users that have Investigations permissions should see "Investigations" as an option in advanced search.

title: Investigation Form - Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN Investigation permission varies for different user (Test-ARI-viewer@mlb.com, test_boc_viewer@mlb.com, test_boc_admin@mlb.com and test_boc_approver@mlb.com)
custom_steps: WHEN the users logs in
custom_expected:
THEN the following should be true 
-The form has a view only permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, but cannot edit anything.  Users without the permission cannot view the form anywhere in the system.
-The form has a "registration" permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, but can only edit/create Investigations with a type = Registration. Users without this permission or the admin permission cannot edit or create Investigations anywhere in the system. 
-The form has an admin permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, and can edit/create any Investigation type. Users without this permission cannot edit or create non-Registration Investigations anywhere in the system.

title: As a user I want to only see Investigations that I have permission to see within the player's Investigation History (Historical Only)
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club and BOC wants to only see Investigations that they have permission to
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to see an investigation on the investigation history
custom_expected:
THEN Club users will only able to see an investigation on the investigation history if the following are ALL true:
     * They are the requesting Club for the investigation. (The Org on the Investigation Form is their Organization)
     * The player is currently under contract with the org OR the player is a Free Agent
     * The investigation was entered on or after January 1, 2011. 
AND BOC Investigations users are able to see all investigations in the player's Investigation History, regardless of when they were entered or who requested them.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to see that a player has an investigation on file even if I do not have permission to see the Investigation

AND the player has at least one Investigation (not request) in ebis
AND Club user doesn't have permission to view ANY of the Investigations in the player's history
custom_steps: WHEN user is in player's Investigation History
custom_expected: THEN display the text "Investigation on file - please contact the BOC for more information" in the Investigation History widget.

title: BOC user wants to send a Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen
AND a submitted waiver request bulletin exists for the selected request date
AND it is after 2PM on request date
AND "Send Request Bulletin" button is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should store the current Request Bulletin as it currently exists
AND blue notification should display stating that the request bulletin has been sent successfully
AND screen should be reloaded in View mode, with the Org filter set to "All" and with the "Players with Requested Waivers" section as the only one expanded
AND "Claim" button should appear in the left most column of the Players with Requested Waivers table
AND "Pending" text should be removed from the Bulletin
AND "Results" section should now appear on the form, but collapsed
AND "Resend Notification Emails" button should now be visible

title: Club user wants to see Players with Requested Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
AND user has navigated to the waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN a "Players with Requested Waivers" collapsible section should be displayed and expanded by default
AND this section should NOT be visible to Clubs prior to the Bulletin being sent
AND "Players with Requested Waivers" section should match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND "Players with Requested Waivers" section should contain all of the players for whom waivers were requested by all Orgs for the currently selected Request Date
AND the table should be sorted by Org and then by the player's name (Last, First)
AND the "Request Entry" section should be collapsed by default
AND expanding "Request Entry" should display the players that the Club has requested waivers on for the "Request Date" being viewed
AND if no players are found in the Request Entry section, there should be a line of text stating "No Waiver Requests Found"

title: BOC User wants to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim on behalf of a club
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Players with Requested Waivers" section of Waivers screen on transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN a Claim button should be displayed for all players if 'All' is chosen in Org dropdown
BUT if user chooses a specific Org, the Claim button should not appear for players from that Org
AND clicking the Claim button should launch a pop-over that allows the user to select a single Org
AND the player's Org should not appear in the dropdown, nor should any other Orgs that have already submitted a waiver claim for the player
AND clicking “Cancel” should close the popover and take no action
AND selecting an Org and clicking "Claim" should  prompt the user to confirm the claim
AND once user has confirmed they wish to proceed with the claim, modal and popover should be dismissed and user should be returned to "Players with Submitted Requests" table
AND the Claim button should remain for the player
AND if BOC user were to expand the "Results" section of form at this time, they would see "Claimed by ORG date/time" information just as though a Club had performed the Claim
AND if BOC user has entered a Claim on behalf of a club and it is after 1:00PM on the Claim Expiration Date, result should show Claim Expiration Date as mm/dd/yyyy in the result and 12:59 pm as the time in the result

title: BOC User wants to view Waiver Claim results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC user
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen on Transactions dashboard
AND user has selected a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user has selects a Request Date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
custom_expected:
THEN the "Results" collapsible section should be available
AND this section should be open by default, with the remaining sections collapsed when the current date is equal to the Claim Period expiration date
AND the Results table should match the provided data discovery and wireframe
AND the Results Bulletin Comments text area should be available and visible per the wireframe

title: User wants sending Waiver Results Bulletin to properly set results for players who have secured waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Waivers have been requested for a player
BUT these requested waivers do not yet have a result
AND these requested waivers have NOT been claimed or cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN results should be set according to the following criteria:
For UR waivers,result text should be set to "Secured for the purposes of UR".
For TRADE waivers for non-optioned players, result text should be set to  "Secured Through Conclusion of Championship Season"
For all other waivers, result text should be set to "Secured until {Waiver Claim Expiration Date}"

title: Automatically create a UR transaction if UR waivers were requested for a player and no team claimed him
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a UR waiver request has been submitted for one or more players
AND these request(s) do not have a claiming Org
AND these requests have not been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Results Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN an Unconditional Release transaction should be created by the system and automatically approved if one does not already exist for this player from this Bulletin
AND Transaction Date  should be set to the Current Date
AND Club and Org should be set to request Org 
AND Create, Approved, and Last Changed Date should be set to the current date
AND Waiver Link Transaction ID should be set to requests's Transaction ID 
AND a system should create a non-clickable link in the player’s history
AND system should create entry in Player History (black font), Description = Unconditional Release, Code = UNCRL , From Org/Club
AND system should update player's MJ and MN Roster Status to Free Agent
AND system should Update player's Org and Club to Null
AND transaction should be added to Daily Transaction Bulletin

title: Club user wants to view Waiver Claim Results
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in and viewing Waivers Screen
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a Request Date for which Results Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN if the Org had at least one submitted request a table should display containing ONLY the players that the Org requested waivers on, and include the Results as displayed on the Waiver Results Bulletin
BUT if the Org did not have at least one submitted request,  the text "No Waivers Requested" should display
AND 'Players Claimed' subsection should be displayed
AND If the Org had at least one player that they entered a claim on - whether or not they were determined to be the "Eligible" Org, the Players Claimed table should display per the wireframe and include only the players that the viewing Org submitted a claim for
BUT if the Org was deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Eligible"
AND if the Org was not deemed to be the Eligible Org, then the "Results" should say "Not Eligible"
AND  if the Org did not have at least one player that they claimed, then the text "No Players Claimed" should display

title: Club user wants to see a Create Waiver Claim Assignment button for player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in 
AND club has requested REVOCABLE waivers for one or more players
AND the waivers have been claimed
BUT the waivers have not been cancelled
AND current time is before 1:30 PM on Withdrawal Expiration Date
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the relevant Request Date on Waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Create Waiver Claim button in the "Player Results" table for these players
BUT this button should not appear after 1:30 PM on Withdrawal Expiration Date

title: BOC user wants to see appropriate button for a player in Results table
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Player Results" table within "Results" section
custom_expected:
THEN if Waivers have been cancelled for a player, then no button should display
AND if the BOC can only Cancel waivers for the player, then a simple "Cancel" button should be displayed
AND if the BOC can create a player notification, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were not Claimed and not Cancelled)
AND if the BOC can Player Accept or Player Reject, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", "Player Accept", "Player Reject" and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled for which a waiver claim assignment has not yet been created.)
AND if the BOC can Create a Waiver Claim for a player, then a split button should be available with "Create Waiver Claim" and "Cancel" available. (Revocable, claimed requests for which a waiver claim does not already exist)

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC user
AND user has navigated to Waivers Request Entry Screen
AND user has selected a date for which a Request Bulletin has been sent 
AND "Send Result Bulletin" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should store the current Result Bulletin as it currently exists
AND blue notification should display stating that the result bulletin has been sent successfully
AND screen should be reloaded in View mode, with the Org filter set to "All" and with the "Results" as the only section expanded
AND "Edit" button should no longer be available for this Request Date
AND "Claim" buttons should no longer be available for this Request Date for the BOC or for Clubs

title: Club user wants PDF of results bulletin attached to notification they receive

custom_steps: WHEN user receives a notification that a result bulletin has been sent (or notifications resent)
custom_expected:
THEN "Description" in the notifications widget should be clickable
AND clicking on the description should download the associated pdf of the results bulletin

title: Waiver Permissions(Player Profile) - Club User

custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers Section of Transactions Tab on a Pro Player Profile
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to view the data for all columns

-All requests that have been included on a Request Bulletin (NO Pending requests)
-All Claims made by their own Org that have been included on a Results Bulletin
-All Claims made by other Orgs on requests they entered that have been included on a Results Bulletin
-All Withdrawals made by their own Org

title: User wants PDF of Results Bulletin attached to the email they receive

custom_steps: WHEN a Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to Send a Request Bulletin
AND "Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND "Send Notification" is checked off under "Request Bulletin" for BOC and Club users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Request Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification selected
AND All entered waiver requests should be included in this email
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Request Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT only OPT, OR and UR waiver requests should be included in that email
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Req Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
     -MLB - Waiver Request Bulletin
     -Bulletin #1003353 Mon 08/15/2016
     -Claim period expires Wed 08/17/2016
AND Format of each request should be:
     -Type - Requesting Org
     -Player Last, Player First Middle Initial. - POS - MLS: 0.000
     -Last TX: (as displayed on bulletin in system)
AND Bottom of email should contain:  "ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin*"

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin to Club users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to send a Waiver Result Bulletin
AND Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND "Send Notification" is checked off under "Result Bulletin" for Club users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for Clubs that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification selected. All Waiver Requests will be included
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT this email should be identical to the one generated for "Send Notification", except no TRD requests should be shown
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Res Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
-MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin
-Full Club Name (Ex: Los Angeles Dodgers)
AND The remainder of the email should be broken out into two sections. Each section only appears if it is relevant to the Club
AND bulletin should display a "Results" section that details the results for any requests that the viewing Org submitted. If none were submitted for this request date, this should not be displayed. Format as follows:
Results of request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
-Format of each result should be:
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
-{Waiver Result}
AND if player was not claimed, Waiver Result should match what is displayed on the Results section for BOC (ex: Secured through end of the Championship Season)
BUT if player was claimed, then Claiming information should be shown. Eligible Org has . 
Example:
-Claimed by: MIA 8/11/2016 12:58
-TB 8/11/2016 12:32
-LAA 8/11/2016 12:46
-TOR 8/11/2016 12:35
-HOU 8/10/2016 16:16
-NYY 8/11/2016 12:44
AND after the Request section, a section should appear detailing the results of any Claims that the Org made, if any
BUT if no claims were made by the Org then this section does not appear. Format as follows:
Results of your claims from request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
-{Waiver Claim Result}
AND Bottom of email should contain -
"ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin *"

title: User wants to generate Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release Letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user is logged in
AND a Player has been Unconditionally Released as a result of UR waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Released player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN "Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release" should appear as an option in the Create New menu for players under "Player Letters"
AND selecting this option should print the proper pdf of the letter using the proper information from the player's profile
AND users should have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND users should have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND users should have the ability to enter the Expiration Date to be populated on the form
AND if the language on player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish, form should be generated in English
BUT if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish, form should be generated in Spanish
AND PDF should follow provided format and details

BUT form should be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish
AND pdf should follow the provided format and details

custom_expected:

AND clicking on the date should open the associated waiver claim assignment
AND form should match the provided wireframe and data discoveries
AND same behavior should be present in the associated players' player histories

title: WCA automatically created for irrevocable waivers upon sending results bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN non-UR Irrevocable waivers have been requested for one or more players
AND these waivers have been claimed
custom_steps: WHEN Results bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN a waiver claim assignment should be created and submitted to BOC for these players
AND for Outright Waivers, the Waiver Claim Assignment should have a Cash Consideration of $20,000 unless the player was Rule 5 DE/SEL, then it should be be $25,000
AND for all waivers, the player should be listed as long as the Cash Consideration and that is it
AND clubs should not be able to manipulate the terms at all in the Submitted to BOC state

title: User wants to create Waiver Claim Assignment - Player Accept
custom_preconds:
GIVEN waivers have been requested for a player
AND relevant request bulletin has been sent
AND waivers have been claimed by one or more orgs
AND relevant results bulletin has been sent
AND user has navigated to the player table in Claims/results section on waivers screen
AND "Player Accept" is available in a split button next to this player's name
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Player Accept"
custom_expected:
THEN system should create a preliminary waiver claim assignment for the selected player and redirect the user to the transaction
AND Waiver Claim Assignment should have the creating Org's consideration be for the player, and the claiming Org's Cash Consideration = $1
AND  player the waivers were requested for should NOT be able to be removed from the transaction
AND if a preliminary waiver claim assignment already exists for the selected player, the system should redirect the user to the existing waiver claim assignment instead of creating a new one
AND club should have the ability to add additional players and conditions as needed, then the WCA should follow the stateflow of a Trade

title: BOC user wants to approve Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has been submitted for a player
AND BOC user has navigated to the submitted Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all On Approve rule checks that would run on an outright trade
AND once all rule checks pass, the Waiver Claim Assignment should be marked as "Approved"
AND system should Follow all On Approve rules listed for Outright Trades, including:
- Daily Transaction Bulletin entry
- Player History entry
- Auto-Creation of a Recall where applicable
- Roster Status, Club and Player Info updates.
- Clearing of the Approvals item for the BOC and generation of a notification for the involved Clubs

title: User wants to receive error when placing player with submitted waiver request on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player
AND selected player has a submitted waiver request (Request Bulletin not yet sent) with Request Date on or after the Injury Date on the DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Player with a submitted waiver request may not be assigned. The waiver request should be deleted before re-submitting the assignment."
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx

BOC should NOT be able to override this error

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has previously secured waivers on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player
AND player has any secured waivers (waivers in effect on profile) as of the Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Previously secured {0} waivers for this player will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
AND {0} should be replaced with the waiver type
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with tx

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has any pending waiver requests on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Player has pending {0} waiver request(s) that will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
AND {0} should be replaced with the waiver type
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with tx

title: Allow BOC user to approve a place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
AND transaction is in  Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected status
AND blue "Approve" button is available
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user clicks "Approve"
AND all rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND item is reloaded in view mode if it was in edit mode
AND a successful blue notification (#80) is displayed that states the transaction was approved
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = DL07J Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields should be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status is set to 7-Day Concussion DL

title: Reject a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:

AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: BOC user approves Reinstate from DL tx

custom_expected:

AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History should be updated: Code = REINS Description = Reinstate From {Disabled List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's MJ roster status should be set to Active

title: BOC user wants to approve a Return from Rehab tx

custom_expected:

title: User wants reinstating a player from the DL to update their information on the Recertifications tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has been reinstated from the DL
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Recertifications" tab
custom_expected:
THEN "Reinstatement Date" column should only be populated once the player has been Reinstated from the DL
AND "Reinstatement Date" column should have the Reinstatement Date entered on their Reinstatement for this DL placement
AND the "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND if the Reinstatement Date is on or before any of the Recertification Due dates listed - these dates should be removed from the form

title: Club user wants to submit a Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to submit a "Recertification" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary state in view or edit mode
AND blue "Submit" button is available on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message
AND system should run On Submit rules check
AND after the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Approved"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful approve blue notification. Messages #76
AND no entry should be added to the player's player history
AND no notification for "Approved" should be generated since this transaction is auto-approved
AND no approvals item should be generated for this transaction either since this transaction is auto-approved

title: Allow BOC user to approve a place on 7-Day DL transaction

GIVEN a Place on 7-Day DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC

WHEN the BOC user clicks "Approve"

custom_expected:

title: Reject a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND if item was on the Approvals clipboard it should be removed
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND pending Minor League roster status should be set to value in history prior to the tx submission
AND pending player history entry should be removed

title: BOC user approves Reinstate from DL tx

custom_expected:

AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)

title: User wants to submit a Return from Rehab tx to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Return from Rehab" transaction

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful save blue notification #76
AND If the player’s pending MJ roster status is Rehab 60 Day DL, then set the player’s MJ pending roster status to 60 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Rehab 7 Day DL, then it should be set to 7 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Restricted/Assigned then it should be set to Restricted.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Suspended/Assigned then it should be set to Suspended.
AND system should create an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = RHBRT, Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Minor Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should be displayed in the comments column of the Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: Add new Cash Transactions

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Transaction"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a popup that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount that are associated with the transaction
AND an "Add Transaction" button should become enabled when all of the required fields have been entered properly
AND clicking this "Add Transaction" button should close modal, and populate Cash Transaction table of BOTH LRD and CBT payroll report utility with cash transaction information for selected Org
AND the reverse of the transaction shhould also be added to the counterpart's cash transactions table so that for one it appears as a positive, and the other as a negative. (Ex: If Payor is ARI and Payee is BOS for a transaction of 1,00,000, then ARI will have that amount subtracted from their totals while BOS will have it added)
AND if the filter is set to "All" then the cash transaction should only be displayed once
